Title: Dinosaurs on a Spaceship
Plot: An unmanned spaceship hurtles towards certain destruction - unless the Doctor can save it, and its impossible cargo... of dinosaurs! By his side a ragtag gang of adventurers; a big game hunter, an Egyptian Queen and a surprised member of the Pond family. But little does the Doctor know there is someone else onboard who will stop at nothing to keep hold of his precious, prehistoric cargo.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
